text: @realDonaldTrump SCOTUS ruled on this in the 60's in the Vietnam Era...you remember Vietnam...oh year, bones spurs.  The 1st amendment that lets you hold rallies in cities with COVID19 raging allows them to burn the flag.  We might not like it but just as legal as killing people with disease.
